DOC.brief_summary: The intubating Laryngeal Tube Suction-Disposable new version Laryngeal Tube-Suction . It ventilator channel 13.5mm internal diameter , enable passage Endotracheal Tube either blindly fiberoptic guidance.This study design assess success rate blind fiberoptic endotracheal intubation use iLTS-D , comparison Ambu® AuraGain™ adult patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Intubating Laryngeal Tube Suction Ambu AuraGain
DOC.detailed_description: The intubating Laryngeal Tube Suction-Disposable ( iLTS-D ) ( VBM Medizintechnik GmbH , Sulz , Germany ) new update version Laryngeal Tube-Suction Disposable ( LTS-D ) It ventilator channel 13.5mm internal diameter , enable passage Endotracheal Tube ( ETT ) either blindly fiberoptic guidance . Similarly As LTS-D , iLTS-D also separate channel purpose placement gastric tube placement size 18 Fr . The iLTS-D come one size . According depth insertion , device equivalent size 4 patient 175patients 175 190 cm tall , size 5 patient tall 190 cm . The iLTS-D provided manufacturer compatible 7.5mm ETT plastic stabilizer removal device . The current randomized study design assess success rate blind fiberoptic endotracheal intubation use iLTS-D , comparison Ambu® AuraGain™ adult patient general anesthesia
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiology I II Difficult intubation , Cervical pathology
